results.title: The Good Wife
results.brief_description: The Good Wife is a legal drama starring Emmy Award winner Julianna Margulies as a wife and mother who boldly assumes full responsibility for her family and re-enters the workforce after her husband’s very public sex and political corruption scandal lands him in jail.

results.title: The Good oil
results.creator_credit: Keith Gow, Elisabeth Knight and Film Australia
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “The Law”.
A funny, true to life story about a group of residents and their conflict with a nearby factory management. The residents’ indignation over sleepless nights and spoiled washing has its funny moments but the way is opened for serious questions about our changing environment

results.title: The Good news is water
results.brief_description: Outlines the work of UNICEF in providing a permanent, clear water supply to a village in Imo State in Eastern Nigeria. The installation of such a water supply will combat cholera, diarrhoea and guinea worm contracted from using contaminated water holes.

results.title: The Good Lord Bird
results.brief_description: Enslaved teenager Henry Shackleford, aka Little Onion, becomes a member in abolitionist John Brown’s motley family during the Bleeding Kansas era before the Civil War.

constellations_other.name: VFX to fantasy and freedom
constellations_other.description: Founded in Sydney, and now with offices worldwide, Animal Logic are an Academy Award-winning VFX and animation studio whose job is to bring the impossible to life. And they're in good company with these other artists and filmmakers.

results.title: The Good food show. series 2
results.brief_description: Gabrielle Gate takes us through a series of episodes which focus not only on good eating, but good health also. The emphasis is on freshness, quality and the excellence of Australian produce. Guest chefs appear on the programs to offer the viewers a range of delicious recipes and ideas. The programs on this tape are: Fishy tales; The Humble spud; Sweet temptations and Something special.

results.title: The Good Food Cookbook
results.brief_description: The Good Food Cookbook will not only show you how to master all those cooking techniques which recipes never seem to explain, but also give you hundreds of practical tips and hints so that you can both buy, prepare and cook food so much more easily and enjoyably. Rated: G

results.title: The Good Fight
results.creator_credit: Sam Sills, Mary Dore and Noel Buckner
results.brief_description: An excellent political documentary about more than three thousand Americans who joined the Abraham Lincoln Brigade to fight in the Spanish Civil War from 1936-1939, although their participation was frowned upon in many quarters in America at the time. Newsreel clips, anecdotes from veterans, and a Hollywood film, “Blockade”, are deftly edited together to produce this valuable ennobling history lesson. Rated: G
